response.overview: In a strange and dystopian world, between chaos and magic, one sullen and bony dog ​​confronts the absurd, by a series of paradoxes and frustrations.  In a timeless time, where the questioning of existence is complicated with the eternal need for closeness and coexistence and where death balances with the countervailing power of hope. A surreal journey, unfolding unexpectedly in and out of the gaze of a suffering creature, the  dog.
response.title: in limbo
